message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see where it goes from here.
I'll give you 400k, now it's your turn to make a better offer!
I'd like to get a better deal. I'll propose 420k for me, and you can take the rest.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of inflation. Your turn to decide!

I'm getting ruthless, take the 100k or I'll take it all. Time's running out!
